title: FS 4 Different 1910-12 P2 Sweet Caporal Pins
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: FS 4 Different 1910-12 P2 Sweet Caporal Pins
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have these 4 Different 1910-12 P2 Sweet Caporal Pins for sale. Archer, McIntyre, Quinn, and Wolter. Nice fronts. Missing the lock pin on the reverse. Archer is also missing the advertising on the back.

Price: $15.00 each. Your choice. Or start a collection and take all four pins for $55.00.

Shipping: Please add $3.50 to cover the shipping.

Payment: Paypal, check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
